name: Quinlin - 2021 Demo Alpha 2
description:
This is the latest demo of Quinlin an open world retro style game inspired by the Atari series Sword Quest.

The game takes place in the mid to late 1800s and has you play as the adventurer Quinlin a young man seeking adventure and exploration. Work, hunt, buy, sell and explore an open world filled with dangers and wonders.

CONTROLS:

The default controls are keyboard only:

A - Action key to interact with signs and NPCs. Also for forwarding dialogue.

S - Use of a selected tool.

Arrow Keys - Control Movement

Q - toggle tool bar left

E - Toggle Toolbar Right

Z - Toggle Toolbar Fast

C - Toggle Toolbar Column (current tool set)

X - Toggle Facing Direction

F - Pause Menu

(PAUSE MENU)

Arrow Keys - Navigate

A - select/forward

B - select/reverse

F1 - Fullscreen Toggle

Backspace - restart game

Esc - exit game completely
